name: I've been spending my commute re-"reading" The Dresden Files audiobooks, starting from the beginning. Currently enjoying Grave Perl (Book #3), and am reminded that James Marsters does an incredible job bringing voice to the books. 📚

content.html: I've been spending my commute re-"reading" The Dresden Files audiobooks, starting from the beginning. Currently enjoying Grave Perl (Book #3), and am reminded that James Marsters does an incredible job bringing voice to the books. 📚

summary: @cleverdevil Was very disappointed when they chose to axe the TV series after just one season.

content.html: @cleverdevil Was very disappointed when they chose to axe the TV series after just one season.

summary: @colinwalker I never watched the TV series, as it was on (and then cancelled) before I even started The Dresden Files. I've heard mixed reviews, but am hopeful that it'll get another shot at adaptation for TV / Movies down the line.
